summary: Adds a powerful, and somewhat balanced mage\'s weapon. Sotha Sil\'s Mageblade is an ancient weapon that was used by Sotha Sil prior to achieving apotheosis with the Heart of Lorkhan.
descriptionHtml:
This is an old, creation kit release era mod that has been on the Steam Workshop for a long time. I only uploaded it here because it was requested.

Adds a powerful, and somewhat balanced mage\'s weapon. Sotha Sil\'s Mageblade is an ancient weapon that was used by Sotha Sil prior to achieving apotheosis with the Heart of Lorkhan. 

---------------------------- 
| Detailed Description | 
---------------------------- 

***************************Sotha Sil\'s Mageblade******************************* 

Intended to be used by Mage builds, the dagger sacrifices the ability to dual cast for significantly increased spell power while providing the user with increased defenses. A much needed boost for mage builds. 

Increases spell power by 50%. 

Casts a 30 magnitude ward at 74 Restoration and below, the ward increases to 60 magnitude at 75 Restoration and higher. 

It can be tempered with a Refined Moonstone and is affected by Elven Smithing, however the dagger does not attack. 

Visually, it is a reskinned Iron Dagger. 

***************************Sotha Sil\'s Spellblade******************************** 

A version of the Mageblade which does not cast the ward but can be used to attack. It is statistically the same as a glass dagger, but is lighter and cannot be enchanted. 

It can be tempered with a Refined Moonstone and is affected by Elven Smithing. 

-------------------- 
| How to Obtain | 
-------------------- 

Sotha Sil\'s Mageblade can be found within a display case in the Archmage\'s Quarters at the College of Winterhold. 

Sotha Sil\'s Spellblade can be obtained by combining a Refined Moonstone and the Sotha Sil\'s Mageblade at a forge. It is listed under Elven Smithing but does not require it to transform. You can transform it back into the Mageblade the same way. 

--------------- 
| Other Info | 
--------------- 

Dawnguard is not required.
